featured.text: The names were chosen from a name pool 36 of 140 names, 10 each from the 14 members of the committee.

other.text: The economic crisis may have also played a role: Homeowners who were not able to pay their bank loans were forced to abandon their properties, sometimes leaving behind swimming pools that made excellent mosquito breeding grounds.
George at first had difficulty swimming across the pool, but he finally succeeded on his fourth .
The rain makes running pools in the gutter.

definition.zh_def: 一個供人們游泳、戲水或進行水上活動的人工水體。
definition.en_def: A man-made body of water for swimming, recreation, or water activities.
definition.example: We spent the afternoon relaxing by the pool.
